code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:m referee aged 45 years presents with mild difficulty with reading and writing, mild difficulty in school. he has history of mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words. Patient is a moderate drinker he denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 65 in, Weight 204 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.

s:a m referee aged 47 yrs complains of mild difficulty in school x 2 weeks. NKDA. o:Height 65 in, Weight 202 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.
